episodes.title: Bill Gates Regrets 'Every Minute' With Epstein, Explosive Interview After Melinda Demands Answers
episodes.description:
Bill Gates has finally answered new Epstein revelations, including a lurid draft email about “Russian girls” that resurfaced in the latest document dump. Gates insists he only ever attended “dinners,” never set foot on Epstein’s island and “never met any women,” calling every minute spent with him a mistake. His comments come just days after ex‑wife Melinda spoke of “painful times” in their marriage as his name reappeared in the 3‑million‑file release.

INTERNATIONAL NEWS

#BillGates #EpsteinFiles #MelindaGates #DocumentDump #Scandal #Investigation

episodes.title: Epstein’s Russian Shadow: Why The Silence After New US Files Uncover Clinton's Forbidden Flights?
episodes.description:
Newly released US files have reignited the Epstein scandal, revealing shocking details about flights to Russia involving Jeffrey Epstein and former President Bill Clinton. Why has this explosive information gone mostly unreported, and what does it mean for global politics and elite networks? In this video, we break down the newly uncovered documents, the mysterious Russian connections, and the silence surrounding one of the most controversial chapters in modern political history.

episodes.title: Handwritten Note On 'Nubile Girls': Trump's New Epstein Nightmare, DoJ Damage Control| Files| Nassar
episodes.description:
The U.S. Department of Justice has released a new batch of court-mandated investigation documents linked to Jeffrey Epstein, triggering renewed scrutiny of President Donald Trump’s past association with the convicted sex offender. The files include internal emails, flight logs, handwritten notes and disputed allegations, with records suggesting Trump flew on Epstein’s private jet multiple times in the 1990s. The documents also reference rape allegations and a controversial handwritten letter attributed to Epstein, which the DOJ has since declared fake. Trump has denied wrongdoing, saying ties with Epstein ended years ago. The Justice Department stressed Trump faces no criminal charges and warned that some released material contains false or unverified claims submitted before the 2020 election.

INTERNATIONAL NEWS

#JeffreyEpstein #EpsteinFiles #DonaldTrump #USJusticeDepartment #DOJ #USPolitics #USNews #EpsteinInvestigation #WorldNews

episodes.title: On TV, UK Minister Goes Soft On Disgraced Prince Andrew? 'He Surrendered Proud…'| Epstein| Charles
episodes.description:
UK Defence Secretary John Healey confirmed that the government will remove Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor’s final military title of Vice Admiral, following guidance from King Charles III. The move comes amid efforts to distance the royal family from Andrew’s links to the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. Andrew continues to deny allegations of misconduct, including those made by Virginia Giuffre. The King’s decision marks the first forced removal of a royal title in a century, aimed at protecting the monarchy’s reputation. Royal experts warn the fallout could be “cataclysmic” for the institution.

episodes.title: The Epstein Curse Spares No Crown Or President? Prince Andrew’s Downfall Reignites Tough Questions
episodes.description:
A royal scandal has crossed the Atlantic and it’s shaking the very foundations of power in Washington. Prince Andrew’s fall from grace may look like a belated act of royal accountability, but its ripple effect has reached U.S. politics, reopening the dark chapter known as the Epstein files. As the King strips his brother of titles, questions in Washington are growing louder: What do these files really contain? Who is protecting them and why? At the center stands Donald Trump, once photographed with Epstein and now accused of shielding information he once vowed to release. And then came Elon Musk’s explosive tweet claiming Trump’s name was in those files, a post quickly deleted, but not forgotten. From Buckingham Palace to Capitol Hill, this story isn’t just about power, it’s about who dares to face the ghosts of the past when they come knocking again. 
#EpsteinFiles, #PrinceAndrew, #TrumpControversy, #BuckinghamPalace, #WhiteHouseScandal, #RoyalCrisis, #JeffreyEpstein, #EpsteinCase, #WashingtonDC, #PowerAndPrivilege, #PoliticalScandal, #TrumpNews, #ElonMusk, #RoyalFamily, #EpsteinConnection, #JusticeDepartment, #USPolitics, #CampaignTrail, #ScandalInThePalace, #Accountability, #BreakingNews, #PowerCorridors, #TruthAndConsequences, #EpsteinInvestigation

episodes.title: Prince Andrew’s Shame Goes International? Anthony Albanese Gives A Blunt Response Amid Royal Scandal
episodes.description:
Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese responded to questions about King Charles’s decision to strip Prince Andrew (Andrew Mountbatten) of his royal titles. Speaking at a press conference, Albanese said the matter was entirely for “His Majesty” and that the King can make such decisions “without the benefit of my advice.” The Prime Minister emphasized that Australia respects the decisions made by the Royal Family and refrained from offering further comment. The remarks come amid renewed public debate over Prince Andrew’s role and status within the monarchy following allegations and the King’s reported move to further limit his titles.

episodes.title: Russia’s ‘Jesus Christ’ Arrested: How Ex-Traffic Cop Turned Messiah Built A Cult After Soviet Fall
episodes.description:
The end of the USSR in 1991 was one of the most cataclysmic events in history, with its aftereffects still being felt three decades on. But there was one such moment triggered at the same time, that was unforeseen. It was the rise of a new religious order in a remote corner of Russia, powered by the 'spiritual awakening' of a man. Meet Sergei Torop, or as he is popularly known, the 'Vissarion'. In the 1990s, Torop claimed he was the reincarnation of Jesus of Nazareth. A new Church was established, Torop amassed thousands of followers but then came his fall from grace, he was subjected to thorough investigation leading to a severe directive from the Russian state.


In this episode of HT In-Depth, we look at the history of Sergei Torop's cult, from his 'divine revelation', to the establishment of his new 'Church', and the perceived end of his massive cult. Watch this video for full details on the Vissarion.


INTERNATIONAL NEWS

#russia #christianity #jesus #jesuschrist #virginmary #religion #vissarion #fsb #vladimirputin #putin
